subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Henrik Samuelsson, the son of the Rangers assistant coach Ulf Samuelsson, made his N.H.L. debut against the Rangers, who are tied with the Islanders atop the Metropolitan Division after Thursday’s win.
snippet: Henrik Samuelsson, the son of the Rangers assistant coach Ulf Samuelsson, made his N.H.L. debut against the Rangers, who are tied with the Islanders atop the Metropolitan Division after Thursday’s win.
